blocks.name: csle
blocks.content: Declare the syntax for surreal less than or equal.
blocks.origin: const class csle { ≤s }

blocks.name: diff.csle.s
diff.csle.c
diff.csle.w
df-sle
blocks.content: Define the surreal less than or equal predicate. Compare ~ df-le . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 8-Dec-2021.)

blocks.name: sltirr
blocks.content: Surreal less than is irreflexive. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: slttr
blocks.content: Surreal less than is transitive. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: sltasym
blocks.content: Surreal less than is asymmetric. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: sltlin
blocks.content: Surreal less than obeys trichotomy. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: slenlt
blocks.content: Surreal less than or equal in terms of less than. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 8-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm slenlt(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, csur), wcel(c1, csur)), wb(wbr(c0, csle, c1), wn(wbr(c1, cslt, c0))))
} = {
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c0, csur), wcel(c1, csur)), wbr(c0, csle, c1), wn(wbr(c1, cslt, c0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, csur), wcel(c1, csur)), wn(wbr(c0, ccnv(cslt), c1))))
  3bitri(wbr(c0, csle, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, csur), wcel(c1, csur)), wn(wbr(c0, ccnv(cslt), c1))), wbr(c0, cdif(cxp(csur, csur), ccnv(cslt)), c1), wa(wbr(c0, cxp(csur, csur), c1), wn(wbr(c0, ccnv(cslt), c1))))
  breqi(c0, csle, c1, cdif(cxp(csur, csur), ccnv(cslt)))
  df-sle()
  brdif(c0, cxp(csur, csur), ccnv(cslt), c1)
  anbi1i(wbr(c0, cxp(csur, csur), c1), wn(wbr(c0, ccnv(cslt), c1)), wa(wcel(c0, csur), wcel(c1, csur)))
  brxp(c0, csur, csur, c1)
  bitr3d(wa(wcel(c0, csur), wcel(c1, csur)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, csur), wcel(c1, csur)), wn(wbr(c0, ccnv(cslt), c1))), wn(wbr(c1, cslt, c0)), wn(wbr(c0, ccnv(cslt), c1)))
  ibar(wa(wcel(c0, csur), wcel(c1, csur)), wn(wbr(c0, ccnv(cslt), c1)))
  notbid(wa(wcel(c0, csur), wcel(c1, csur)), wbr(c0, ccnv(cslt), c1), wbr(c1, cslt, c0))
  brcnvg(c0, csur, c1, csur, cslt)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm slenlt(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ No ∧ c1 ∈ No)→(c0[≤s]c1 ↔ ¬ c1[<s]c0))
} = {
  syl5bb((c0 ∈ No ∧ c1 ∈ No), c0[≤s]c1, ¬ c1[<s]c0, ((c0 ∈ No ∧ c1 ∈ No)∧ ¬ c0[`' <s]c1))
  3bitri(c0[≤s]c1, ((c0 ∈ No ∧ c1 ∈ No)∧ ¬ c0[`' <s]c1), c0[((No × No)\ `' <s)]c1, (c0[(No × No)]c1 ∧ ¬ c0[`' <s]c1))
  breqi(c0, csle, c1, ((No × No)\ `' <s))
  df-sle()
  brdif(c0, (No × No), `' <s, c1)
  anbi1i(c0[(No × No)]c1, ¬ c0[`' <s]c1, (c0 ∈ No ∧ c1 ∈ No))
  brxp(c0, csur, csur, c1)
  bitr3d((c0 ∈ No ∧ c1 ∈ No), ((c0 ∈ No ∧ c1 ∈ No)∧ ¬ c0[`' <s]c1), ¬ c1[<s]c0, ¬ c0[`' <s]c1)
  ibar((c0 ∈ No ∧ c1 ∈ No), ¬ c0[`' <s]c1)
  notbid((c0 ∈ No ∧ c1 ∈ No), c0[`' <s]c1, c1[<s]c0)
  brcnvg(c0, csur, c1, csur, cslt)
}

blocks.name: sltnle
blocks.content: Surreal less than in terms of less than or equal. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 8-Dec-2021.)

blocks.name: sleloe
blocks.content: Surreal less than or equal in terms of less than. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 8-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm sleloe(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, csur), wcel(c1, csur)), wb(wbr(c0, csle, c1), wo(wbr(c0, cslt, c1), wceq(c0, c1))))
} = {
  bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, csur), wcel(c1, csur)), wbr(c0, csle, c1), wo(wbr(c0, cslt, c1), wceq(c0, c1)), wn(wbr(c1, cslt, c0)))
  slenlt(c0, c1)
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c0, csur), wcel(c1, csur)), wo(wbr(c0, cslt, c1), wceq(c0, c1)), wn(wbr(c1, cslt, c0)), wo(wceq(c1, c0), wbr(c0, cslt, c1)))
  bitri(wo(wbr(c0, cslt, c1), wceq(c0, c1)), wo(wceq(c1, c0), wbr(c0, cslt, c1)), wo(wceq(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cslt, c1)))
  orcom(wbr(c0, cslt, c1), wceq(c0, c1))
  orbi1i(wceq(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cslt, c1), wceq(c1, c0))
  eqcom(c0, c1)
  con2bid(wa(wcel(c0, csur), wcel(c1, csur)), wo(wceq(c1, c0), wbr(c0, cslt, c1)), wbr(c1, cslt, c0))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, csur), wcel(c1, csur), wb(wbr(c1, cslt, c0), wn(wo(wceq(c1, c0), wbr(c0, cslt, c1)))))
  mpan(wa(wcel(c1, csur), wcel(c0, csur)), wb(wbr(c1, cslt, c0), wn(wo(wceq(c1, c0), wbr(c0, cslt, c1)))), wor(cslt, csur))
  sltso()
  sotric(cslt, csur, c1, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sleloe(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ No ∧ c1 ∈ No)→(c0[≤s]c1 ↔(c0[<s]c1 ∨ c0 = c1)))
} = {
  bitr4d((c0 ∈ No ∧ c1 ∈ No), c0[≤s]c1, (c0[<s]c1 ∨ c0 = c1), ¬ c1[<s]c0)
  slenlt(c0, c1)
  syl5bb((c0 ∈ No ∧ c1 ∈ No), (c0[<s]c1 ∨ c0 = c1), ¬ c1[<s]c0, (c1 = c0 ∨ c0[<s]c1))
  bitri((c0[<s]c1 ∨ c0 = c1), (c1 = c0 ∨ c0[<s]c1), (c0 = c1 ∨ c0[<s]c1))
  orcom(c0[<s]c1, c0 = c1)
  orbi1i(c0 = c1, c0[<s]c1, c1 = c0)
  eqcom(c0, c1)
  con2bid((c0 ∈ No ∧ c1 ∈ No), (c1 = c0 ∨ c0[<s]c1), c1[<s]c0)
  ancoms(c0 ∈ No, c1 ∈ No, (c1[<s]c0 ↔ ¬(c1 = c0 ∨ c0[<s]c1)))
  mpan((c1 ∈ No ∧ c0 ∈ No), (c1[<s]c0 ↔ ¬(c1 = c0 ∨ c0[<s]c1)), <s ≺ No)
  sltso()
  sotric(cslt, csur, c1, c0)
}

blocks.name: sletri3

blocks.name: sltletr

blocks.name: sletr
blocks.content: Surreal transitive law. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 8-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm sletr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, csur), wcel(c1, csur), wcel(c2, csur)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, csle, c1), wbr(c1, csle, c2)), wbr(c0, csle, c2)))
} = {
  3imtr4d(w3a(wcel(c0, csur), wcel(c1, csur), wcel(c2, csur)), wa(wbr(c0, csle, c1), wbr(c1, csle, c2)), wbr(c0, csle, c2), wa(wbr(c0, csle, c1), wn(wbr(c2, cslt, c1))), wn(wbr(c2, cslt, c0)))
  expimpd(w3a(wcel(c0, csur), wcel(c1, csur), wcel(c2, csur)), wbr(c0, csle, c1), wn(wbr(c2, cslt, c1)), wn(wbr(c2, cslt, c0)))
  con3d(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, csur), wcel(c1, csur), wcel(c2, csur)), wbr(c0, csle, c1)), wbr(c2, cslt, c1), wbr(c2, cslt, c0))
  imp(w3a(wcel(c0, csur), wcel(c1, csur), wcel(c2, csur)), wbr(c0, csle, c1), wi(wbr(c2, cslt, c0), wbr(c2, cslt, c1)))
  expcomd(w3a(wcel(c0, csur), wcel(c1, csur), wcel(c2, csur)), wbr(c0, csle, c1), wbr(c2, cslt, c0), wbr(c2, cslt, c1))
  3coml(wcel(c0, csur), wcel(c1, csur), wcel(c2, csur), wi(wa(wbr(c2, cslt, c0), wbr(c0, csle, c1)), wbr(c2, cslt, c1)))
  sltletr(c2, c0, c1)
  anbi2d(w3a(wcel(c0, csur), wcel(c1, csur), wcel(c2, csur)), wbr(c0, csle, c1), wbr(c1, csle, c2), wn(wbr(c2, cslt, c1)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, csur), wcel(c1, csur), wcel(c2, csur), wb(wbr(c1, csle, c2), wn(wbr(c2, cslt, c1))))
  slenlt(c1, c2)
  3adant2(wcel(c0, csur), wcel(c1, csur), wcel(c2, csur), wb(wbr(c0, csle, c2), wn(wbr(c2, cslt, c0))))
  slenlt(c0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sletr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ No ∧ c1 ∈ No ∧ c2 ∈ No)→((c0[≤s]c1 ∧ c1[≤s]c2)→ c0[≤s]c2))
} = {
  3imtr4d((c0 ∈ No ∧ c1 ∈ No ∧ c2 ∈ No), (c0[≤s]c1 ∧ c1[≤s]c2), c0[≤s]c2, (c0[≤s]c1 ∧ ¬ c2[<s]c1), ¬ c2[<s]c0)
  expimpd((c0 ∈ No ∧ c1 ∈ No ∧ c2 ∈ No), c0[≤s]c1, ¬ c2[<s]c1, ¬ c2[<s]c0)
  con3d(((c0 ∈ No ∧ c1 ∈ No ∧ c2 ∈ No)∧ c0[≤s]c1), c2[<s]c1, c2[<s]c0)
  imp((c0 ∈ No ∧ c1 ∈ No ∧ c2 ∈ No), c0[≤s]c1, (c2[<s]c0 → c2[<s]c1))
  expcomd((c0 ∈ No ∧ c1 ∈ No ∧ c2 ∈ No), c0[≤s]c1, c2[<s]c0, c2[<s]c1)
  3coml(c0 ∈ No, c1 ∈ No, c2 ∈ No, ((c2[<s]c0 ∧ c0[≤s]c1)→ c2[<s]c1))
  sltletr(c2, c0, c1)
  anbi2d((c0 ∈ No ∧ c1 ∈ No ∧ c2 ∈ No), c0[≤s]c1, c1[≤s]c2, ¬ c2[<s]c1)
  3adant1(c0 ∈ No, c1 ∈ No, c2 ∈ No, (c1[≤s]c2 ↔ ¬ c2[<s]c1))
  slenlt(c1, c2)
  3adant2(c0 ∈ No, c1 ∈ No, c2 ∈ No, (c0[≤s]c2 ↔ ¬ c2[<s]c0))
  slenlt(c0, c2)
}
